heading: Thrillers (Motion pictures).
general-note: This heading is used as a topical heading for works about films that feature a build up of suspense, tension, uncertainty, menace, and anxiety as primary elements and in which the audience is kept on tenterhooks. When used as a topical heading it is subdivided by the appropriate geographic, topical, and/or form subdivisions..
Works on the use of suspense in motion pictures, television programs, and video recordings are entered under. Suspense in motion pictures, television, etc..
